channel.title: CVE Feed for LuxSoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LuxSoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39939|2024-08-02T18:18:10.144Z -- luxsoft -- luxcal%20web%20calendar
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in LuxCal Web Calendar prior to 5.2.3M (MySQL version) and LuxCal Web Calendar prior to 5.2.3L (SQLite version) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary queries against the database and obtain or alter the information in it.

item.title: CVE-2023-39543|2024-08-02T18:10:21.207Z -- luxsoft -- luxcal%20web%20calendar
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in LuxCal Web Calendar prior to 5.2.3M (MySQL version) and LuxCal Web Calendar prior to 5.2.3L (SQLite version) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is using the product.
